price: 67. For every news there is a reality[2] and you will come to know.
footnotes: (V.6:67): i.e. for everything there is an appointed term, and for every deed there is a recompense.

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan
